name: Callable: New Hire Onboarding - Add employee to #newmoose slack channel
description: When there is a new call for callable recipe, do action

code.name: receive_request
code.description: New call for Callable: New Hire Onboarding - Add Employee to #newmoose slack channel

input.service_name: Callable: New Hire Onboarding - Add Employee to #newmoose slack channel

block.name: declare_variable
block.title: Create variable PROCESS_COL_add_emp_to_#newmoose_slack

data.process_col_add_emp_to_newmoose_slack:
=#Only start to process this automation Thursday (or 5 days) before start date
if (_('data.workato_service.1ed1e07a.request.Employee_Start_Date')-5.days) < today
#Only flow if the business process reason contains the words 'New Hire'
  if _('data.workato_service.1ed1e07a.request.Employee_Business_Process_Reason').include?("New Hire")
#Only flow if the associated field actually contains a checkbox
    if _('data.workato_service.1ed1e07a.request.GSheet_Col').present?
#Only flow if the associated field checkbox is set to 'FALSE'
      if _('data.workato_service.1ed1e07a.request.GSheet_Col') == "FALSE"
        true
      else
        false
      end
    else
      false
    end
  else
    false
  end
else
  false
end
